metadata.dc:author: Serrano Badía, E
Guallart Doménech, F
Mompó Romero, L
Pons Rocher, F
Faubel Serra, M
Dalmau Galofré, J
Artazkozl del Toro, J J
metadata.dc:description: We present a case of Amyloidosis of the oral cavity associated to multiple mieloma, with otolaryngological symptom. Review of structural characterization of the disease, its pathogenesis and clinical disorders when displayed in thyroid, oral cavity and upper respiratory tract.
metadata.dc:title: Manifestaciones otorrinolaringológicas de la amiloidosis. A propósito de un caso de localización lingual.
[Otolaryngological complaints in tongue amyloidosis: a case report].
